<header className="hero">

# Creating your custom theme

`wip`

</header>

1. Create a new `.scss` file on `src/themes` (e.g. `my-theme.scss`) in your [starter project](https://github.com/vtex-sites/starter.store), and add the tokens you want to overwrite inside the `.theme` class:

```css
.theme {
  // --------------------------------------------------------
  // Colors (Branding Core)
  // --------------------------------------------------------

  // --------------------------------------------------------
  // Typography (Branding Core)
  // --------------------------------------------------------

  // --------------------------------------------------------
  // Spacing (UI Essentials)
  // --------------------------------------------------------

  // --------------------------------------------------------
  // Grid & Layout (UI Essentials)
  // --------------------------------------------------------

  // --------------------------------------------------------
  // Interactive Controls (UI Essentials)
  // --------------------------------------------------------

  // --------------------------------------------------------
  // Refinements
  // --------------------------------------------------------

  // --------------------------------------------------------
  // Components
  // --------------------------------------------------------
}
```

2. Go to `faststore.config.js` and change the `theme` to your file's name:

```js
// Theming
theme: 'my-theme',
```

If you want, you can work on `custom-theme.scss` file that's ready to use. Also, we provide two themes as examples: [soft-blue](/docs/themes/soft-blue) and [midnight](/docs/themes/midnight).
